title: [Eye of V'Tull, Crystal Chamber]
description: The cavern opens into a large chamber full of luminous blue crystal stalactites and pools of bubbling orange lava.  Nearby several pillars of igneous rock guard a plume of super heated steam jetting out of several cracks in the floor.  The steam has formed the ceiling here into a mirror polished dome over thirty feet at its peak.
paths: Obvious exits: south, southwest, west, northwest
